Text: Don't forget to comment if it works or doesn't on ur android phone

Works great on SGT. Fantastic program too.

Thank you for buying PowerAMP Full Version!
Please do not uninstall PowerAMP Full Version Unlocker application if you want to keep Full Version available on this device.

EffMinor try reinstalling the program. I'm still using this program with no hiccups, and everytime I start the program I get the message above. Hope you allowed apps to be installed outside the android market.

works!

@ effminor - if you go into manage apps and choose Power Amp and then clear the cache (data) the program will work again. you may have to keep doing it every few days, but the app is worth it..
